summary: Hi! My name is Thinh Tran. After spending my childhood in Vietnam, I moved to the United States for college in 2011. I completed my first Bachelor Degree in Electrical Engineering Technology from ODU in 2016. I went back a year later for a Bachelor in Computer Science and completed the program in 2020. I'm in love with programming. In my free time, I work on different web projects. One of them is this website, I have developed it with .Net Blazor Webassembly. I originally created it as a profile page, but later added more features that can be used as an mobile app. Feel free to use the codes of the site for your projects. Happy coding!:)
skills: Proficient languages: C#, Typescript and HTML
Proficient frameworks: ASP .Net, Blazor and Angular
Proficient IDE: Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code

educations.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering Technology

responsibitites: Creates web pages and API endpoints as directed by team lead and software documentation
Creates SQL procedures and views as needed for application development
Attends daily development meetings to review development plans
